entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core throws InvalidOperationException because [NotMapped] attribute is not declared over a readonly property #28221
  • Move CosmosConventionSetBuilder out of internal apis. #28220
  • If we group on an expression (e.g. a ternary), should the expression be re-used rather than further translated when selected in another expression (e.g. ternary)? #28219
  • Many to Many - Additional Properties #28218
  • Add additional overloads to provider ServiceCollectionExtensions methods. #28217
  • Don't generate unneeded subquery in TPC with OfType #28214
    Backlog

Closed

  • No-Relational Provider #28114
  • regression in efcore 6.0.5 causes crashes when table name starts with a number #28211
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IMutableForeignKey.set_DeleteBehavior(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DeleteBehavior)' when scaffolding. #28213

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for CSharpHelper for List literals #28212

Updated

  • Add entity-splitting model building support #28156
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
